name: Mobius Management Systems
overview: Mobius Management Systems, Inc. provides integrated solutions for Enterprise Archiving and Records Management(EARM). It offers ViewDirect TCM suite of solutions that meet various enterprise requirements for managing and delivering content. The suite includes products for storing, integrating, viewing, and delivering content, as well as specialized tools for automating business processes, accessing content across disparate repositories, building and maintaining Internet/intranet sites, and monitoring data for accuracy. It includes facilities for integrated access to disparate content repositories, as well as products that support content-intensive applications, including content integration, records management, email management, Web site management, business process management, imaging, enterprise report management, SAP integration, and an audit and balancing facility. The firm markets its products through a network of agents in Central and South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Mobius Management Systems, Inc. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in New York, New York. The company has sales offices in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, Sweden, the Netherlands, Australia, and Japan. As of June 15, 2007, Mobius Management Systems, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Allen Systems Group, Inc.
